name: Aion: Steel Cavalry
description:
Aion: Steel Cavalry is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by NCSOFT. It came out on 29-01-2014. It was published by NCsoft. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Aion: Steel Cavalry on PC.
Wonsik Woo produced the game. It was directed by Yongchan Jee. It was scored by InRo Joo and Ryo Kunihiko.
